channel.title: Web on Sun Notes
channel.description: Recent content in Web on Sun Notes

item.title: Designing and Implementing Dark Mode in Hugo
item.description: Recording the hurdles encountered while adding dark mode functionality to a website, as well as frontend display tips and implementation on Hugo.

item.title: JWT Authentication Mechanism Principles and Implementation Examples (C#)
item.description: JWT (JSON Web Token) is an open standard used for securely transmitting information between parties. JWT uses JSON objects to represent the messages to be transmitted and uses digital signatures or encryption to protect these messages.
